Package APIAssets

Class Constants

java.lang.Object
APIAssets.Constants
public class Constants extends Object
This is a Java Application that fetches data from a news api (https://newsapi.org/docs/endpoints/top-headlines) And then processes the data by restricting the articles to five per keyword. It then processes it to remove any special Characters and emoticons and stores it in a NOSQL MongoDB Database.
Since:
Apr 02, 2023
